scene_description_enriched: The image displays a heraldic crest. At the top, a white dog with pointed ears stands atop a golden helmet. Behind the dog are stylized golden plumes or feathers. The helmet is adorned with blue and red accents. Below the helmet, a shield is depicted, divided into four quadrants. The left quadrants feature a dark background with a red lion rampant, outlined in gold. The right quadrants are blue with golden, stylized leaf-like charges. The entire composition is set against a parchment background with visible texture and some staining.
